p: To assess herd immunity to influenza A and B viruses, 3728 serum samples collected in the fall of 2017 from healthy donors living in the territory of the Russian Federation were examined. None of the samples reacted with antigens A(H5N8) and A(H7N9) in HI tests, even at a 1:10 dilution. Fig 1 depicts the results obtained in the HI tests with the seasonal influenza vaccine strains for 2017â€“2018.
